name: Treasure Jewels: Match 3 Legen
description:
Match and quest jewels in fun gameplay to complete the mission goals.
Treasure Jewels: Match 3 Legend is a classic puzzle game that will keep you coming back for more with hours of fun and brain bending puzzles!
Match 3 gems in a row to smash them, and complete hundreds of challenging jewel-matching puzzles to collect coins and gem powers. Explore a jewels temple in a quest to crush gems, break tiles, squash slime and reveal hidden treasure!
-- Advanced, Intuitive Graphics.
-- Hundreds of Challenging Levels
-- Amazing power-ups to supercharge your scores
-- Special Power gems
-- Share with your friends.
